M10Robot:AmmoBox.NAME: Ammo Box
M10Robot:AmmoBox.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Attacks with m10robot:Recharging don't consume charges and deal !M! additional damage.

M10Robot:AssaultField.NAME: Assault Field
M10Robot:AssaultField.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to a random enemy !M10Robot:SecondMagic! times.

M10Robot:AttackDown.NAME: Attack Down
M10Robot:AttackDown.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Gain Strength this turn equal to amount removed. NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:Atomize.NAME: Atomize
M10Robot:Atomize.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! m10robot:Bomb. NL Evoke every m10robot:Bomb Orb.

M10Robot:AutoCaster.NAME: Auto Caster
M10Robot:AutoCaster.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Whenever you Channel an Orb, Evoke it.
M10Robot:AutoCaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Whenever you Channel an Orb, Evoke it !M! times.

M10Robot:BalanceCurrents.NAME: Balance Currents
M10Robot:BalanceCurrents.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! HP for each buff they have and gain !M! Block for each debuff they have.

M10Robot:BatteryPack.NAME: Battery Pack
M10Robot:BatteryPack.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Store X charges. NL Right Click to spend a charge to gain [E] . NL Charges: !M10Robot:AmmoCount! / !M!

M10Robot:BlankSlate.NAME: Blank Slate
M10Robot:BlankSlate.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Boosters on this card are applied twice.
M10Robot:BlankSlate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL m10robot:Boosters on this card are applied twice.

M10Robot:BreakingForce.NAME: Breaking Force
M10Robot:BreakingForce.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card.
M10Robot:BreakingForce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards.

M10Robot:Concentration.NAME: Concentration
M10Robot:Concentration.DESCRIPTION: When Equipped: NL Gain 1 Focus at the beginning of your turn, to a maximum of !M!. This Focus is lost when this is unequipped.

M10Robot:DefenceDown.NAME: Defence Down
M10Robot:DefenceDown.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Block. NL Gain Block equal to amount removed. NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:DoubleCaster.NAME: Double Caster
M10Robot:DoubleCaster.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL The first Orb you Evoke each turn is Evoked twice.
M10Robot:DoubleCaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL The first !M! Orbs you Evoke each turn are Evoked twice.

M10Robot:EMP.NAME: EMP
M10Robot:EMP.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. If this attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! m10robot:Stasis.

M10Robot:EmptyBuffer.NAME: Empty Buffer
M10Robot:EmptyBuffer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke every Orb. NL Channel each Orb that was just Evoked.

M10Robot:EvasionDown.NAME: Evasion Down
M10Robot:EvasionDown.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On to ALL enemies. NL Gain Focus this turn equal to Lock-On applied. NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:FeedForward.NAME: Feed Forward
M10Robot:FeedForward.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage increases by !M! this combat for each subsequent card played this turn.

M10Robot:Filter.NAME: Filter
M10Robot:Filter.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards. NL Gain [E] for each card exhausted this way.
M10Robot:Filter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust any number of cards. NL Gain [E] for each card exhausted this way.

M10Robot:HealthDown.NAME: Health Down
M10Robot:HealthDown.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! HP. NL Gain Temporary_HP equal to HP removed. NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:HomeSweeper.NAME: Home Sweeper
M10Robot:HomeSweeper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each turn passed this combat.

M10Robot:ImaginaryNumbers.NAME: Imaginary Numbers
M10Robot:ImaginaryNumbers.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M10Robot:SecondMagic! Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
M10Robot:ImaginaryNumbers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M10Robot:SecondMagic! Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:MagicTinkering.NAME: Magic Tinkering
M10Robot:MagicTinkering.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL + !M! m10robot:Primary NL Requirements: NL Has a m10robot:Primary
M10Robot:MagicTinkering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Modifications: NL + !M! m10robot:Primary NL Requirements: NL Has a m10robot:Primary

M10Robot:Malfunction.NAME: Malfunction
M10Robot:Malfunction.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose !M10Robot:SecondMagic! HP. NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:MalfunctionOLD.NAME: Malfunction OLD
M10Robot:MalfunctionOLD.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Lose !M10Robot:SecondMagic! HP. NL m10robot:Returning.
M10Robot:MalfunctionOLD.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! card. NL Lose !M10Robot:SecondMagic! HP. NL m10robot:Returning.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Lose !M10Robot:SecondMagic! HP. NL m10robot:Returning.
Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Lose !M10Robot:SecondMagic! HP. NL m10robot:Returning.

M10Robot:PileDriver.NAME: Pile Driver
M10Robot:PileDriver.DESCRIPTION: Lift an enemy into the air and slam it down onto a random enemy, dealing !D! damage to both.

M10Robot:PolishingKit.NAME: Polishing Kit
M10Robot:PolishingKit.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL + !M! damage NL + !M! Block NL Requirements: NL Has Block or damage.

M10Robot:PowerSavings.NAME: Power Saving Mode
M10Robot:PowerSavings.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Deal !M10Robot:SecondMagic! % less damage. NL At the start of your turn, gain

M10Robot:QuickRepair.NAME: Quick Repair
M10Robot:QuickRepair.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL Heal !M! HP NL Requirements: NL Is an Attack

M10Robot:RapidAssembly.NAME: Rapid Assembly
M10Robot:RapidAssembly.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Add a random m10robot:Booster to your hand. NL Exhaust.
M10Robot:RapidAssembly.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Add a random m10robot:Booster to your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a random m10robot:Booster to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Draw !M! cards. NL Add a random m10robot:Booster to your hand.

M10Robot:RecoveryMode.NAME: Recovery Mode
M10Robot:RecoveryMode.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Gain !M! Temporary_HP at the beginning of every turn, up to a maximum of 5.

M10Robot:RecklessAttack.NAME: Reckless Attack
M10Robot:RecklessAttack.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL + !D! Damage NL Gain !M! m10robot:Recoil Requirements: NL Deals damage

M10Robot:ReflectiveShell.NAME: Reflective Shell
M10Robot:ReflectiveShell.DESCRIPTION: This turn, you may not take damage and attacks upon you are reflected onto the attacker.
M10Robot:ReflectiveShell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For !M! turns, you may not take damage and attacks upon you are reflected onto the attacker.

M10Robot:Repeater.NAME: Repeater
M10Robot:Repeater.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Plays the effect of equipped m10robot:Boosters at the beginning of your turn.
M10Robot:Repeater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL While Equipped: NL Plays the effect of equipped m10robot:Boosters at the beginning of your turn.

M10Robot:ReturningShield.NAME: Returning Shield
M10Robot:ReturningShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

M10Robot:RoboBeam.NAME: Robo Beam
M10Robot:RoboBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Repeat for every 5 turns that has passed this combat.

M10Robot:Rumble.NAME: Rumble
M10Robot:Rumble.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Gain !M! Strength this turn each time you attack.

M10Robot:Rushdown.NAME: Rush Down
M10Robot:Rushdown.DESCRIPTION: Charge towards the enemy, dealing !D! damage to any enemy you collide with. If you have Thorns, they activate on each hit.

M10Robot:Salvo.NAME: Salvo
M10Robot:Salvo.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Orbs without Evoking them. For each Orb removed this way, throw it, dealing !D! damage.

M10Robot:ScrambleField.NAME: Scramble Field
M10Robot:ScrambleField.DESCRIPTION: This turn, the target is unable to deal over !M10Robot:SecondMagic! damage and unable to gain over !M10Robot:SecondMagic! Block.

M10Robot:ScrapBooster.NAME: Scrap Booster
M10Robot:ScrapBooster.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL + !M! Block NL Requirements: NL Has Block

M10Robot:Seeker.NAME: Seeker
M10Robot:Seeker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Searchlight.

M10Robot:SelfDestruction.NAME: Self Destruction
M10Robot:SelfDestruction.DESCRIPTION: Move towards the enemy and explode. Deals up to !D! damage to ALL enemies based on proximity.

M10Robot:SlotConversion.NAME: Slot Conversion
M10Robot:SlotConversion.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Gain !M! Orb slots.

M10Robot:SpectralCannon.NAME: Spectral Cannon
M10Robot:SpectralCannon.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL m10robot:Recharging !M10Robot:AmmoCount! / !M10Robot:ThirdMagic!. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:SpikyPlating.NAME: Spiky Plating
M10Robot:SpikyPlating.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Whenever you are attacked, deal !M! damage back.

M10Robot:SplitBeam.NAME: Split Beam
M10Robot:SplitBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Any enemy hit more than once takes an additional !D! damage.

M10Robot:SubroutineDefend.NAME: Subroutine: Defend
M10Robot:SubroutineDefend.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL Gain !B! Block NL Requirements: NL Is playable

M10Robot:SubroutineDraw.NAME: Subroutine: Draw
M10Robot:SubroutineDraw.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL Draw !M! card NL Requirements: NL Is playable
M10Robot:SubroutineDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL Draw !M! cards NL Requirements: NL Is playable

M10Robot:SubroutineStrike.NAME: Subroutine: Strike
M10Robot:SubroutineStrike.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL Deal !D! damage NL Requirements: NL Is playable

M10Robot:TargetingSystem.NAME: Targeting System
M10Robot:TargetingSystem.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL At the beginning of your turn, randomly apply !M! Lock-On.
M10Robot:TargetingSystem.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL While Equipped: NL At the beginning of your turn, randomly apply !M! Lock-On.

M10Robot:Turbo.NAME: Turbo
M10Robot:Turbo.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next !M! turns, draw an additional card and gain [E] . NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:WarForged.NAME: War Forged
M10Robot:WarForged.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! m10robot:Toxic. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Tungsten. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Ritualist. NL Exhaust.

M10Robot:WaveGenerator.NAME: Wave Generator
M10Robot:WaveGenerator.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Recharging !M10Robot:AmmoCount! / !M10Robot:ThirdMagic!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

M10Robot:WeaponPlatform.NAME: Weapon Platform
M10Robot:WeaponPlatform.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies with Lock-On.

M10Robot:WeaponPoison.NAME: Weapon Poison
M10Robot:WeaponPoison.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL Apply !M! Poison NL Requirements: NL Is an Attack

M10Robot:WeaponPolish.NAME: Weapon Polish
M10Robot:WeaponPolish.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Playing an attack boosts its damage by !M! this combat.

M10Robot:WideAngle.NAME: Wide Angle
M10Robot:WideAngle.DESCRIPTION: Modifications: NL Card becomes multi-target NL Requirements: NL Is single-target

M10Robot:WindUp.NAME: Wind Up
M10Robot:WindUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Permanently increase this cards damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.
M10Robot:WindUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Permanently increase this cards damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.
